app.name: WiiRadio
app.long_description:
WiiRadio is a SHOUT/ICEcast stream player, ripper and music visualizer for the Wii.
Includes language packs, skinning capabilities and local music playback.
Coding By: Scanff and Knarrff Graphics By: TiMeBoMb
